a switch is a physical connection in a network, used to redirect traffic. it prevents users from sniffing past it (unless you do what ultraj6 has described, which is technically speaking not passive sniffing). i'd recommend you read more about sniffing and man in the middle attacks in wikipedia to learn about how the system works
